Reviews.Title: “Berlin Half Marathon - perfect hotel”
Reviews.Author: katesamar
Reviews.Content: 3 night stay running half marathon sunday 1 april 2012 picked due location start finish hotel perfect appreciated check travelling uk immaculate clean modern bathrooms ive seen quiet didnt eat hotel nice bar resturant location easy transport links airport plus regular tourist buses excellent italian restaurant road twice german restaurant road easter market taking town centre proved browsing negative teacoffee facilities

Reviews.Title: “very excellent for the price”
Reviews.Author: Joel810
Reviews.Content: pleased hotel paid 68 euros night weekend package included breakfast breakfast huge buffet offering vast variety cold warm dishes interaction staff exception nice friendly reasonably spacious nicely outfitted furniture looked brand definitively bathroom marble washstand location alexanderplatz perfect visiting city

Reviews.Title: “Our city break”
Reviews.Author: marsbareastbourne
Reviews.Content: stayed nights 16th 17th april 2012 nice clean hotel situated offering excellent accommodation facilities nice indoor pool staff friendly helpful restaurant food reasonable prices definitely worth dining hotel english tv news programmes overall complaints highly recommended looking lunchtime restaurant snack try 5th floor galeria shopping centre cakes die cheap

Reviews.Title: “Nice location, bad attitude”

Reviews.Content: stayed nights business slow check moody reception clerks catch train comfortable busy street located pay wifi complicated tmobile system train station alexanderplatz 10 mins walk plenty shops restaurants former border east berlin price 80 ok money

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel - Great location for Metro but not for Nightlife”
Reviews.Author: Peter_MacPherson
Reviews.Content: location exploring berlin nightlife alexanderplatz poor don’t try restaurant alexanderplatz there’s pleasant bathroom stunning positives nice lovely breakfast – choice food negatives tea coffee facilities minibar fridge service drinks menu limited serve simple gin tonic bar advertised brochure 1630 1800 bar weren’t location metro nighttime entertainment

Reviews.Title: “Nice place to stay, close to Prenzlauer Berg (which is nice)”
Reviews.Author: Elizzze
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel five nights christmas time time bit clean found location loved exploring prenzlauer berg close hotel lot nice restaurants 515 minutes walk staff friendly didnt speak english guys reception speak english recommended nice restaurants near hotel breakfast lot fresh fruit vegetables

Reviews.Title: “good berlin business hotel”
Reviews.Author: Dogontour
Reviews.Content: hotel appears deserves 4 stars nice staff helpful clean modern standard hotel design complaint top floor facing rear awful cellphone reception networks front facing am told spa looks didnt time try

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel to visit Berlin or business”

Reviews.Content: mu stay tot top pricequality nice clean en amazing quit nice sauna swimmingpool wifi lobby fine extra charge breakfast location near busses train en metro tv tower recommanded

Reviews.Title: “Good location, comfortable rooms”

Reviews.Content: comfortable quiet tastefully decorated appeared clean staff friendly gym 8th floor 4 pieces equipment free wifi advertised booking available pay 35 euro 30 days access tmobile hotspot

Reviews.Title: “Centrally Located”
Reviews.Author: Thong_Joy
Reviews.Content: ramada hotel berlin alexanderplatz centrally located modern facilities clean size bigger usual european hotels bathrooms looks clean told hotel 2 complimentary water bottles provided everyday bed firm comfortable whinge pillows soft doesnt provide neck support ready sore neck day bathrooms heated floors excellent cold weather youre late getting ie 9930am housekeepers tendency knock arrival barge consent happened twice terms locality centrally located bus tram nearby alexanderplatz underground train stations 5 minutes walk day 3 5 people ticket day travel modes transport alexanderplatz markets retail shops locality underground restaurants nearby diagonally opposite hotel german fare ie pork knuckles youre paying 15euros breakfast hotel goto hotel door pay 8euros buffet breakfast closeby reasonably spanish las olas spanish restaurant offers atmosphere tapas italian restaurant german service unfriendly food telecom tower nearby 10 mins walk level 38 park inn hotel view berlin city paying half price recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “If you care for first impressions... Ramada Alexanderplatz is a slap on your face”

Reviews.Content: am writing review expected hotel lobby wich tourists screaming lungs reservation ramada book hotel free wifi stay charged advance cancellation policy refundable hotel surprised changed policy wifi free wi fi common hotel talk manager able change day breakfast people using front guy key charged 5 euros curious concierge doesnt speak english little tip location central afford stay historical mitte
